      boolean checkFlight(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> purchaseList)
      Return if tickets the client want are available The purchaseList must contain valid information about the flight legs in the database and each sublist should contain two elements, one is the flight number, the other is the seat type.

    • Method Detail

      • purchase

        boolean purchase(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> purchaseList)
        Return whether the purchase of the client is done The purchaseList must contain valid information about the flight legs in the database and each sublist should contain two elements, one is the flight number, the other is the seat type
        Parameters:
        string - list of all flight leg information of the whole trip
        Returns:
        whether the flight-legs are successfully removed from the database

      • checkFlight

        boolean checkFlight(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> purchaseList)
        Return if tickets the client want are available The purchaseList must contain valid information about the flight legs in the database and each sublist should contain two elements, one is the flight number, the other is the seat type. This method is called before the final purchase to ensure the client could get the ticket for the trip
        Parameters:
        purchaseList - string list of all flight leg information of the whole trip
        Returns:
        whether the flight-legs contained in the ticket are still available
